document.title: Hot Topic: Important Notice of Changes to P.O.S.T. Commission Rules
document.abstract: The Peace Officer Standards and Training (P.O.S.T.) Commission recently enacted several rule changes, several of which will have a significant impact on local law enforcement agencies.
